website_summaries.verdict: Reviewers say you won't notice you're not sleeping on a real bed. One pregnant woman slept on it for eight months and loved it so much she ordered a new one immediately when it started leaking.
pros: Great for use with house guests, moving, and remodels
Hands-free express pump inflates and deflates the bed in seconds
Push-button firmness adjustment from firm to plush.Comes with a convenient carrying and storage bag.Fits deep pocket sheets
cons: Inserting the plug is difficult without losing air

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after a month. Useless
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a little more than a month of use. Now it doesn’t hold air. And can’t even return. Waste of money. I really wanted to believe it would work. It was consumer reports top pick. Should have believed the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: chicago shopper

customer_reviews.title: Leaks air a little 😒
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought this air Mattress because we were planning on doing some camping, this product is rated at 700 lbs which we definitely do not exceed, and our first time camping (which was unfortunately out of the return limit window) we were laying down and all of a sudden “boom/whoosh/ plop” the air mattress ripped at its seems and all the air was gone. After we stopped laughing and realized what had happened we had to figure out different sleeping arrangements. The pump worked good though.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Worst Air Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this air mattress because some how it was top rated on Consumer Reports. The mattress was fine and comfortable for the first couple of uses but after only having it 4 months a total use of 3 times, one of the air chambers inside the mattress burst and now there is a big, long round lump in the middle! Horrible design and engineering. Two thumbs down!
customer_reviews.author: Carrissa Jones

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Product previously used and not new condition!
customer_reviews.text: Highly dissatisfied! The product I received had been used. The box had been retaped and the inside plastic around the air mattress had already been ripped open. When I unrolled the mattress there was human and animal hair on it. It was also discolored. The adapter to the air pump was also missing.
customer_reviews.author: Alie

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This product is not durable, it formed a huge bubble in the middle it’s raised running from top to bottom, literally dividing the air bed into two. It’s definitely not comfortable sleeping on it like that. I am disappointed by it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: A pretty decent Inflatable bed.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I bought one of these at Walamrt and another at costco ... both cost about the same... However after using this one 3 times now for sleepovers I can see why my family love this one the most.... of all 3, it has the sturdiest and most supportive feel. Ok so the sheets sont fit so great... they never fit great on extra thick air mattresses. I am very happy. and I'm a big 240 lb guy my wife about 165.. we felt very comfortable when we set it up and tried it out.. Great Buy.!!
customer_reviews.author: techie mike

customer_reviews.title: Good for short time
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for a temporary stay of several weeks. Easy to set up. Started out fine. Reasonably comfortable for 2 on an air mattress. At end of the 3rd week one of the channels near the center began to give way inside resulting in a raised lump that started at the end of the mattress heading up the middle. Within a few days it was a raised lump from top to bottom, making it barely adequate for 1 person and not usable for 2. If you need it for a short time, or for just a few nights use now and again, it was good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: a-shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress
customer_reviews.text: Great looking. Heavy duty. Comfortable. Just a little irritated that you must keep the pump plugged in while inflating/deflating. I thought it had a battery in the pump so it can be charged then inflated where ever - not the case. Luck we were next to an area that had lots of outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold air
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a guest that was staying for a week. A month ahead of time the mattress arrived, I inflated and left it up (but unfortunately didn't test it by laying on it) and it seemed fine. Excitedly I asked my guest how their sleep was after the first night and they politely said it was fine but they woke up on the floor - the mattress deflated. We've tried everything and it just won't hold air. I had researched ahead of time and this was rated the best by Consumer Products. VERY disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: TSRR

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice mattress. Double height would have been nice and built in air pump. Bought damage box, like new, arrived with a repaired flaw to the box, mattress in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Michele

customer_reviews.title: The best inflatable mattress we ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item 2 months ago. It has gotten a ton of usage and held up excellent. This was a great purchase and I highly recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Tebs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Inflatable! CR recommended
customer_reviews.text: Well made and our 12 year old teenage niece loved the bed! Easy to inflate, wife loves the ease of use. And the pump can be used on other items you need to blow up!
customer_reviews.author: B. Kulick

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and more
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable air mattresses I ever slept on. Easy to inflate. Holds air well. Sheets fit on them and encasements too. Great buy. I actually bought two of these.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Kline

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months air mattress developed a slow leak and no warranty. A lot of money for a leaky mattress. What a disappointment. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Post

customer_reviews.title: Must use pump that comes with unit ONLY!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the description noted that you can only use the pump that comes with unit. This is used for camping and we dont have power and so we can not use the battery pump we have. I wish I knew this and would have returned when I could. WOuld not repeat this unit
customer_reviews.author: KNR

customer_reviews.title: Simmons air mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress does not hold air well! It looses air extremely fast. In the past I have purchased Simmons as my preferred brand. However, this mattress was a complete fail this time.
customer_reviews.author: MELINDA SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Only used 3 weeks & started to deflate. Finally threw out👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Just ok. You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Fair. Felt like you were sleeping on a rubber mattress even with mattress pad & sheets on. Not plush or cozy but it was fine. I think it would have been better if it had been made of more of a fabric material. You get what you pay for in this case. Very easy to inflate!
customer_reviews.author: alistafford

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflate but kind of difficult to deflate. But it sure does the job when you need it. Me and my daughter occasionally stay over my parents house and when all rooms are occupied we use this and we sleep fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: It deflated during the night. Every night that my guests were here we had to pump it back up. They were very in comfortable. The pump is not really "built in" either
customer_reviews.author: Carole L. Monasmith

customer_reviews.title: Slept so good.
customer_reviews.text: I slept really well on this bed, the pump works well for filling and deflation it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Mark

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and sturdy after being up for 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Slept well and held up through 3 girls, laptops, ipads, and games
customer_reviews.author: Carousel

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy - especially for those cases when we have company and need more beds. Inflates in less than one minute! Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: tobinms

customer_reviews.title: Very practical and convenient air mattress
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for another air mattress (different brand) that sprung a leak. Pleased with its durability and smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: rckillion

customer_reviews.title: Great air mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is a great air mattress. Even better with a mattress cover and fitted sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M.

customer_reviews.title: Hole so soon??!!
customer_reviews.text: Hole in seam in only one month of temporary use.
customer_reviews.author: tvtime

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Have to refill it every other day, however I've been using it for over a month daily.
customer_reviews.author: Greg M. Faluszczak

customer_reviews.title: Great value!! Great mattress!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for summer family trip with the kids. This is a great mattess. Very comfortable and a great price. The kids loved it!! I recommend
customer_reviews.author: zhiying chen

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and Easy to Inflate
customer_reviews.text: I liked the height because it made getting out of bed much easier. It was also firm, which was much better for me to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria H

customer_reviews.title: This is not the product I recieved! BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: I received a Broyhill 10" thick air mattress that is very small. The mattress in the photo is not the product you will receive.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Great for company!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! The only thing is that it starts to lose some air within 24 hours but not a major issue. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Shoecraft

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Blows up in no time. Most comfortable air mattress I've ever slept on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small for the medium height people!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re over 5”6 tall, your feet will hang off the bed!
customer_reviews.author: Laceyarens

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress for a great price! So easy to inflate!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother wasting your money!
customer_reviews.text: Was great when I first purchased it back in May but now it has already broken. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Carolan

customer_reviews.title: Lost air quickly
customer_reviews.text: The mattress was comfortable when it was fully inflated however it lost a lot of its air within half an hour of inflating it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Used item twice and one seam broke; less than five nights total. Recommend purchase another similar item.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L

customer_reviews.title: comfortable inflatable matteess
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for camping. On the 3rd day of the trip the Pump stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not durable
customer_reviews.text: It actually burst in the middle of the night last night but it was also very comfortable while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Air bed to own
customer_reviews.text: Got the recommendation from Consumer Reports and they were totally right. It’s a solid air bed, comfortable, and held its shape through the night.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hageland

customer_reviews.title: the quality has changed since last year for the worse
customer_reviews.text: I have to inflate twice a night. It deflates even when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is my permanent bed it's soo comfortable and adorable
customer_reviews.author: Dashawn

customer_reviews.title: Beware of size because it may not be what you expected. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It was suppose to be Queen sized but try full!
customer_reviews.author: Jane G.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflate and deflate. I have slept well on it.
customer_reviews.author: dme

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: This air mattress is OK. Never going to be like a bed. Recommend no one 250 pounds sleep on it. Will be flat by morning.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie in CA

customer_reviews.title: Nomadic grad student approved
customer_reviews.text: At different times in my life over the past couple years, I have slept on this mattress for days or weeks at a time. Indeed, it has been my bed when I've moved across the country and back again. I've had no leaks, no unexplained deflations. The air pump it arrived with is great for in/deflating the thing. It compacts to about the size of a backpack. This mattress is the bomb and I would definitely consider replacing it with the same exact thing.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Hodder

customer_reviews.title: Meh... it's ok
customer_reviews.text: Certainly not the greatest air bed, but I guess that's what you get for the price. It gets the job done, and it is nice to have the pump that comes with it. It's not very comfortable and it's a tight fit for two people to sleep on. I also didn't realize how low 17" would actually be height-wise. I wish i had sprung the extra cash for a wider and taller air bed, but it will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. H

customer_reviews.title: A job well done.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to use as an extra bed when needed. My grown son slept on it for almost two weeks and slept well every night. I laid on it myself and thought it was very comfortable. I would reccomend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: PATREAU

customer_reviews.title: Two weeks after using this mattress, it sprang a ...
customer_reviews.text: Two weeks after using this mattress, it sprang a leak. I wanted it for out-of-town holiday company, and it was so embarrassing when my guest ended up laying on the floor, sunk into a flabby piece of vinyl, hardly being able to get up. I was very careful not to overfill it, I made sure there were no sharp objects anywhere near it, and my guest only weighed 150 lbs which is considerably less than the 700 lb weight limit. I would not purchase another one of them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: had to inflate 3 times in 3 days
customer_reviews.text: this bed must be leaking, it deflates not just a tiny bit but lets about half its air out! i re-read the instructions to make sure i was inflating correctly, but still having this problem. i plan on sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: T&C

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Product
customer_reviews.text: We received this in November and began using it in March. Three air tubes ruptured at the stitching and made one huge lump. It is unusable and because of the time between order date and date of usage, nonreturnable. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does it Job
customer_reviews.text: I like this bed but thought it was higher/taller still a little too close to the floor, glad I will not be using it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: I have had other air beds and would rank this one as one of the worst.
customer_reviews.text: Developed soft spots an a day or so. I returned it. I have had other air beds and would rank this one as one of the worst.
customer_reviews.author: R. martin

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Standard twin size bed length is 75". Since the product dimensions claimed a length of 74", I thought this should be fine. However I realized that the actual bed length is only 70" when I received the bed. This bed is short even for an average height person. I would not recommend this unless you're getting it for your children. I will be returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: Yenal

customer_reviews.title: Displeased with misrepresentation.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this air mattress because the image made the bed look tall but after I blew it up it wasn't as high off the floor at all. I used this mattress for a five day camping trip and had to blow it up three times. I wouldn't buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Melani Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Not whats pictured
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is just like the ones you use for camping, it has a slight raised pillow that's the only difference than the ones you can for half price, it's getting retuned ASAP! Shame on amazon for letting it be part of false advertising!
customer_reviews.author: Navyfostermom

customer_reviews.title: It leaked from the moment I blew it up.  I suggest no one buy it!
customer_reviews.text: It leaked from the moment I blew it up. It was a terrible buy for me at $70. I have a limited income and was very disappointed in this product. I suggest no one buy it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Roxanne Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Best blow up bed on the market- external pump is the only way to go.
customer_reviews.text: I get the best sleep on this bed. This is like a sleep number bed and if you have a sore back, it might work for you too. I recommend that you get the EXTERNAL pump rather than the internal pump because there are too many seams on the internal pump --which is heavy and pulls on the seams ---they are much more prone to fail. I had three in a row that wouldn't stay inflated more than 4 hours and nobody wants to take them back!! Buy blow up beds with External pump ONLY===they don't have the problems and last for years!!
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: A good nights sleep awaits you!
customer_reviews.text: Not like any air mattress I have used before! It inflated in minutes. My wife and I slept on it for two weeks. While not a mattress, it is close. I is nice that it is high, no more getting down on the floor. It stayed inflated for two weeks. And packing up was equally easy with the deflate pump it deflated in minutes and was easy to fold up and put into the included bag. Great way to get a good nights sleep.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Used as bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for one of my spare bedrooms, due to a friend leaving me with bed bugs. So far it's been great. Full size fit my antique bed frame just great. Guest commented that it was comfortably, and they slept well. Said it was a great idea instead of replacing the bed with heavy box springs and mattress. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: SherryLee

customer_reviews.title: Not real sizes
customer_reviews.text: I first inflated and thought, no way this is a queen size. I checked the package and it was. Then I figured I would measure the dimension and sure enough it's missing 3 inches on length and width. This is not a queen size, disappointing we will see about durability and inflation
customer_reviews.author: Francois Lupi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We've used this mattress infrequently and the last couple times it's not held air well. Having to pump it up each morning and now loses enough air in a few hours to be noticeable. I'm just going to go buy a cheap mattress from WalMart and call it a day. Sad this was a bad purchase. The review graph says it all.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hallgren

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We have been bringing it with us on trips for months. Our kids definitely test its durability and it has done very well. The comfort is what I would expect from any typical air mattress. Make sure you have access to an electrical outlet to pump it up. Only complaint is, the carry bag is mediocre.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great for One Person
customer_reviews.text: Got this to host guests during Thanksgiving. It was for an adult couple of standard size. They both said it was very comfortable for one of them but felt too much like a water bed when they were both on it. My brother in law ended up sleeping in a different bed. I would recommend it for how easy it was to set up and take down but I'd be hesitant to recommend it for more than one adult.
customer_reviews.author: D Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Easy extra bed
customer_reviews.text: We used this for an additional bed when our kids visited. The only complaint was that even with a good quality mattress pad, when the room temperature dropped the bed felt cold from the mattress. Next time I think we will double up on the mattress padding.
customer_reviews.author: DebC

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We’re very happy with this purchase. With relatives visiting this became a necessity. They all say they slept well. We recommend this air mattress. Easy to inflate and deflate.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Samiya

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because if the low price but it got great reviews so I gave it a shot. Easy to inflate and deflate. Easy to store. Very comfortable. Slept in it for a week with no aches!!!
customer_reviews.author: gigi lipman

customer_reviews.title: User friendly and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I only bought this as a bed for my guest bedroom for now, since I had a friend coming into town. She said it was very comfy! My husband says inflating it is super easy. This is a very user friendly product.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 30 lb toddler and it began losing air in a week!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pmckay04

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for my guests
customer_reviews.text: Love that it's off the floor some and it stayed inflated for days
customer_reviews.author: Lilleygirl

customer_reviews.title: Popped in less than 20 nights.  Big hole.
customer_reviews.text: After moving across the country I woke up on the floor at 3AM. I tried to re-inflate only to find a large pea sized hole in one of the seams. Save your money, buy a cheap one... they all pop.
customer_reviews.author: jneuberg

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I slept on this mattress for about a week or 10 days after I moved and I was waiting for my bed to be delivered. It was comfortable and I slept well.
customer_reviews.author: Staten Island

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is the most comfortable air mattress I’ve ever slept on.
customer_reviews.author: constant reader

customer_reviews.title: Loses air fast
customer_reviews.text: This mattress loses air faster than any other I have had. A little difficult screwing in the pump also
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca E Miller Riley

customer_reviews.title: Great air bed for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great air bed! Good quality for the price and has held up very good. Doesn't let out air overnight. Easy set up and takedown.
customer_reviews.author: crazyben5150

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Had hole in it the first use of it! Patched it with kit given with mattress, that didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer CGP

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for and pretty dang comfortable for am air matress I must admit!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher smith

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: it didnt last long, two weeks and it started developing holes and losing shape, not a quality purchase
customer_reviews.author: Paul Vest

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: larger than I thought which is good. very easy to blow up. loses a little air already and I've only used a couple of times. soft
customer_reviews.author: Momo Swan

customer_reviews.title: But it is very comfortable to sleep on
customer_reviews.text: Very HEAVY and does not pack down small. But it is very comfortable to sleep on. tough to bring camping.
customer_reviews.author: Max Eichenberger

customer_reviews.title: Great to have another mattress for company and family
customer_reviews.text: Great product - inflates/deflates easily. Comfortable to sleep on but like any air mattress it probably isn't the best for large size guests. I like that when it is deflated it can be stored away out of sight, folded up, in a closet. I like the pump - it works reliably and quickly. I cannot attest to how this mattress would hold up if used all the time since I use it as an extra for company. Also, I like that I control the softness or firmness of this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Richard

customer_reviews.title: deceiving picture
customer_reviews.text: Overall the mattress seems ok, but I'm disappointed with the deceiving picture which makes it appear taller than it actually is. The pump seems to work pretty good and the mattress is comfortable except for the bump or pretend pillow. It's actually annoying. I'm not for or against it. It's just ok.
customer_reviews.author: marisapro

customer_reviews.title: I am happy.. Normally after 30 days
customer_reviews.text: This product has not busted and I have had it now for 6 months... I am happy.. Normally after 30 days, the bed is on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Aziz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent..photo lies!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is pretty decent. However, it is not as high as it is pictured to be. The pump is an external one, so you need to plug it in and then hook it up to the bed. Overall, holding up pretty well!
customer_reviews.author: mariamrastegar

product_meta.title: Simmons Beautyrest Hi-Loft Inflatable Air Mattress: Raised-Profile Air Bed with External Pump, Full
product_meta.description: Style Name:FullThe Simmons Beautyrest Hi-Loft inflatable air mattress is the perfect solution for any time you need a sleep surface such as an extra bed, a planned camping or RV excursion, sleepover, or a guest bed; adjust from firm to plush with the touch of a button using one-touch control on side of mattress. Features a stable and vertical beam construction with built in edge support that prevents rocking, swaying, and side-to-side motion; provides bed like comfort and a peaceful, sleep. Includes Electric Express Pump that inflates and deflates hands free within seconds; bonus adapter for other inflatables. Lower angle beam construction creates a 2" recessed lower panel, providing a suction effect with the floor when lying on top of bed; upper angle beam construction creates an edge support system, keeping from rolling off the mattress when moving during the night. Plush velveteen sleep surface prevents sheets from slipping and is made up of heavy duty puncture resistant vinyl; 100% leak tested. When not in use, conveniently deflates and includes nylon carrying bag. The Simmons Beautyrest Hi-Loft inflatable air mattress fits standard size sheets and can be spot cleaned with water.
feature_bullets: Full size mattress is the solution for when you need a sleep surface such as an extra bed, a planned camping or RV excursion, sleepover, or a guest bed; Adjust from firm to plush with the touch of a button

Features a vertical beam construction with built in edge support that prevents rocking, swaying, and side-to-side motion; Includes Electric Express Pump that inflates and deflates hands free within seconds

Lower angle beam construction creates a 2" recessed lower panel, providing a suction effect with the floor; Upper angle creates an edge support system, keeping from rolling off the mattress during sleep
Plush velveteen sleep surface prevents sheets from slipping and is made up of heavy duty puncture resistant vinyl; 100% leak tested
Fits standard size sheets and can be spot cleaned with water; Measures 16" height and includes nylon carrying bag for when mattress is not in use or in transport

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars256 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
